_comment: Paste Rules Configuration for Dictate App (Windows)
_description: This file defines which keyboard shortcut to use for pasting text in different applications.
- Rules are checked in order (top to bottom)
- If no rule matches, 'default_paste_key' is used
- 'window_class': List of Win32 window class names (case-insensitive).
- 'title_contains': (Optional) List of strings that must appear in window title (case-insensitive)
- 'title_not_contains': (Optional) List of strings that must NOT appear in window title
1. Trigger a paste and check the Dictate console log for window class/title
2. Add a rule with the appropriate paste_key
3. More specific rules should come before general rules
